name: Renew Recovery
description: Former addiction treatment center that provided outpatient treatment for substance use disorders. Based on research, this facility appears to have closed and been replaced by BrightView Health at the same location. Offered drug and alcohol treatment services including counseling and rehabilitation programs.
source: Verified from Yellow Pages listing and multiple treatment center directories - appears to be closed
notes: This facility appears to have closed. The address is now occupied by BrightView Health (866-934-7450). Renew Recovery was a private organization offering outpatient treatment for adults and young adults seeking help for substance use disorders.
capacity: Adults and young adults with substance use disorders
eligibility: Adults and young adults with substance use disorders
